actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hellbender makes two attacks with its claws.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10+5) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Fiery Pulse (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The hellbender sends a burst of fire from all small pores in its chitin-like hide. Any creature within 5 feet of the hellbender must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
